panel.label: Shape
panel.name: Shape
panel.text: Put on a new shape by dragging one from your inventory to your avatar. Alternately, you can create a new one from scratch and wear it.
You do not have permission to modify this wearable.

button.name: Import
button.label: Import
button.tool_tip: Import to currently selected wearable; current wearable must be modifiable

button.name: Export
button.label: Export
button.tool_tip: Export currently selected wearable; asset must be copy/mod/trans and you need to be the creator
